languages.text: {n}Нищий начинает самозабвенно голосить, слова перемешиваются в липкий ком неразборчивых оправданий, покаяний и просьб о милосердии.{/n}
{n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нищий начинает самозабвенно голосить, слова перемешиваются в липкий ком неразборчивых оправданий, покаяний и просьб о милосердии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond starts wailing passionately, his words crumpling into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
{n}The vagabond starts wailing passionately, his words crumpling into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
{n}The beggar starts wailing passionately, his words crumpling into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
{n}The beggar starts wailing passionately, his words crumpling into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
{n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}
{n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞食が大声で泣き出す。彼の言葉には、支離滅裂な言い訳、自責の念、そして慈悲の切望が入り混じっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食が大声で泣き出す。彼の言葉には、支離滅裂な言い訳、自責の念、そして慈悲の切望が入り混じっていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞丐放声大哭起来，他的话语掺杂在一起，变成了一团黏糊糊的东西，其中包括不连贯的借口、对错误行为的悔恨，以及对怜悯的渴求。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐嚎啕大哭起来，他的话语掺杂在一起，变成了一团黏糊糊的东西，其中包括不连贯的借口、对错误行为的悔恨，以及对怜悯的渴求。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mendigo comienza a gemir a pleno pulmón, sus palabras dando paso a excusas incoherentes, expresiones de remordimiento y súplicas de clemencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mendigo comienza a gemir apasionadamente, sus palabras se desmoronan en excusas incoherentes, expresiones de remordimiento y súplicas de clemencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Bettler beginnt, lautstark zu schluchzen. Seine Worte verdichten sich zu einer klebrigen Kugel aus unverständlichen Ausreden, Schuldbekenntnissen und flehentlichen Bitten um Gnade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bettler beginnt, leidenschaftlich zu heulen. Seine Worte knüllen sich zusammen zu einer klebrigen Kugel aus unverständlichen Ausreden, Reuebekenntnissen und flehentlichen Bitten um Gnade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mendiant se met à gémir bruyamment. Entre deux lamentations, il vous semble entendre un mélange d'excuses incohérentes, d'expressions de remords et d'appels à votre clémence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mendiant se met à gémir frénétiquement. Entre deux lamentations, il vous semble entendre un mélange d'excuses incohérentes, d'expressions de remords et d'appels à votre clémence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dilenci, avazı çıktığı kadar ağlamaya başlıyor. Kelimeleri; anlaşılmaz bahanelerden, pişmanlık dileklerinden ve özür yakarışlarından oluşan yapışkan bir top gibi çözünüp gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar starts wailing at the top of his lungs, his words dissolving into a sticky ball of incoherent excuses, expressions of remorse, and pleas for mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenci, avazı çıktığı kadar ağlamaya başlıyor. Kelimeleri; anlaşılmaz bahanelerden, pişmanlık dileklerinden ve özür yakarışlarından oluşan yapışkan bir top gibi çözünüp gidiyor.{/n}
